description: Try our easy to follow Boozy Raspberry Sorbet recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Boozy Raspberry Sorbet Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove sorbet from loaf pan and place into a food processor. Process until smooth. Add liqueur and process until combined. Return mixture to loaf pan, cover and refreeze for 3 hours or until firm. Serve scoops of sorbet in small bowls sprinkled with nuts or place small scoops into tall glasses and top up with chilled prosecco.
